projectGridLines.stationName: Hari Construction and Associates Pvt Ltd
projectGridLines.title: Title: Civil and Architectural works etc. of FGD system for BARH Stage - I (3*660 MW) & Stage – II    (2*660 MW), STTP, BIHAR
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Civil and Architectural works etc. of FGD system for BARH Stage - I (3*660 MW) & Stage – II


(2*660 MW), STTP, BIHAR

Description: This project focuses on improving environmental conditions by removing sulfur dioxide

(SO2) from exhaust flue gases in NTPC-BARH.

Skill sets: Mechanical Engineering

Traits expectation: Should have a good work ethic and discipline.

Expected learning: Fabrication and erection

Specific courses required for project execution: CAD, MS Office
